description: Selects all descendant elements of a specific ancestor.
selects: All <p> elements that are descendants of <div> elements

description: Selects all child elements specified by "child" of elements specified by "parent".
selects: All <button> elements that are children of <div> elements

description: Selects all first "next" elements that follow right after the "prev" element.
selects: All <button> elements that are the immediately following siblings of each <p> element

description: Selects all "siblings" elements that are following siblings of the "prev" element.
selects: All <p> elements that are the following siblings of <button> elements
